```{r}

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

data(kanga, package="faraway")
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
summary(kanga)
library(MASS)

kanga2 <- kanga %>%
  dplyr::mutate(flag = ifelse(is.na(palate.width), 1, 0))
                
q <- EHData::EHExplore_Interactions_Scatterplots(kanga2, "ramus.height", "flag")
grid.arrange(grobs=q[c(1:16)], ncol=4)

qq <- EHData::EHPrepare_MissingValues_Imputation(df=kanga2, y="ramus.height")

```
